Articles.Content: I'd love some basic additions to the astronaut complex. The ability to reject applicants that you don't want. And the ability to retire Kerbals that have served their purpose.
I don't really see what this would really do..?
I think this is a very obvious feature to include. We should expect it from the next updates, as the entire building was introduced in 0.21.

I don't really see what this would really do..?

Reject would remove the unwanted applicant from the applicant list, and retiring would remove the astronaut from the "available" list.
Maybe when career mode appears on the horizon, then this would be worthwhile. In the mean-time there are more pressing issues. Cool suggestion, none-the-less.

I'd love some basic additions to the astronaut complex. The ability to reject applicants that you don't want. And the ability to retire Kerbals that have served their purpose.

Could be a good idea have a button to retire available Kerbals and put them on the applicants list

Something like this
